pages.name: Wolfhook route
pages.desc:
**Wolfhooks ${Wolfhook}** can be found in the wilderness around Wolvendom and are being sold by [**Chloris**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/924280082212737044/924743743062569000/Chloris.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

pages.name: Valberry route
pages.desc:
**Valberries ${Valberry}** can be found in the wilderness of Stormbearer Mountains and are being sold by [**Chloris**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/921999711358054430/922149813477318656/Chloris.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

pages.name: Cecilia route
pages.desc:
**Cecilias ${Cecilia}** can be found in the wilderness of Starsnatch Cliff and are being sold by [**Flora**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/922011009428910160/922151480461525046/Flora.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

pages.name: Windwheel Aster route
pages.desc:
**Windwheel Asters ${Windwheel Aster}** can be found in the wilderness of Mondstadt and are being sold by [**Flora**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/923194392959918090/923316038328778823/Flora.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."

pages.name: Philanemo Mushroom route
pages.desc:
**Philanemo Mushrooms ${Philanemo Mushroom}** can be found in under the eaves of houses in Mondstadt and are being sold by [**Chloris**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/923461709358850059/923724200026451998/unknown.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

pages.name: Small Lamp Grass route
pages.desc:
**Small Lamp Grass ${Small Lamp Grass}** can be found all over Mondstadt and glows at night. It is also being sold by [**Flora**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/937120266990022656/938192271914975292/Flora.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

pages.name: Calla Lily route
pages.desc:
**Calla Lilies ${Calla Lily}** can be found near lakes in Mondstadt and are being sold by [**Flora**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/938544643849719820/939658413405786193/Flora.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

pages.name: Dandelion Seed route
pages.desc:
**Dandelion Seeds ${Dandelion Seed}** can be found in the wilderness of Mondstadt and at Mondstadt gates. They are also being sold by **Karpillia** for way too much mora (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

pages.name: Cor Lapis route
pages.desc:
**Cor Lapis ${Cor Lapis}** can be found in the wilderness of Liyue and are being sold by [**Changshun**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/957351134757019758/972157255044702328/Changshun.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

pages.name: Jueyun Chili route
pages.desc:
**Jueyun Chilis ${Jueyun Chili}** can be found in the wilderness of Liyue and are being sold by [**Chef Mao**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/925096309763997747/925125045855076392/Chef_Mao.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

pages.name: Noctilucous Jade route
pages.desc:
**Noctilucous Jades ${Noctilucous Jade}** can be found in caves in Liyue. They are being sold by [**Shitou**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/949748021611073536/972156385708105788/Shitou.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

pages.name: Silk Flower route
pages.desc:
**Silk Flowers ${Silk Flower}** can be found in the near Yujing Terrace and Wangshu Inn. They are being sold by [**Ms. Bai**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/942081521181917184/942191358691667998/Ms._Bai.png) and [**Verr Goldet**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/942081521181917184/942193167195848784/Verr_Goldet.png) (up to 5 each per 3 days).

> A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.

pages.name: Glaze Lily route
pages.desc:
**Glaze Lilies ${Glaze Lily}** can be found in the wilderness of Liyue and are being sold by [**Ms. Bai**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/942110117283905626/942191944287805471/Ms._Bai.png) (up to 3 per week).

> An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

pages.name: Qingxin route
pages.desc:
**Qingxins ${Qingxin}** can be found in the heights of stone forests in Liyue and are being sold by [**Herbalist Gui**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/926215001088352276/926586479600341032/Herbalist_Gui.png) (up to 10 per 3 days).

> A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

pages.name: Starconch route
pages.desc:
**Starconches ${Starconch}** can be found on the beaches of Liyue and are being sold by [**Bolai**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/951160501361049670/972154982071664650/Bolai.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.

pages.name: Onikabuto route
pages.desc:
**Onikabuto ${Onikabuto}** can be found in the wilderness of Inazuma.

> A strange beetle that inhabits areas rich with Electro energy. Its docile and sedentary temperament could not be more different from the fierce, demonic visage displayed on its armored shell.

pages.name: Sakura Bloom route
pages.desc:
**Sakura Blooms ${Sakura Bloom}** can be found in the wilderness of Inazuma.

> Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

pages.name: Crystal Marrow route
pages.desc:
**Crystal Marrow ${Crystal Marrow}** can be found in the wilderness of Inazuma.

> A crystal that contains a sliver of Tatarigami power. Adding this material during smelting will greatly increase the strength and toughness of metals.

pages.name: Dendrobium route
pages.desc:
**Dendrobiums ${Dendrobium}** can be found in the wilderness of Inazuma.

> A vibrant plant that has also been named the "lycoris" by the poets. It was once thought extinct in the Inazuman archipelago, only to re-emerge now upon the battlefields. It is said that it blooms most enchantingly where much blood was spilled.

pages.name: Naku Weed route
pages.desc:
**Naku Weeds ${Naku Weed}** can be found in the wilderness of Inazuma and are being sold by [**Aoi**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/921171356484263996/921401724185477190/unknown.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> Even on windless days, this plant will tremble lightly amid the cries of thunder. The part of it that resembles petals are in fact extensions of the leaves meant to protect the fragile flower.

pages.name: Sea Ganoderma route
pages.desc:
**Sea Ganoderma ${Sea Ganoderma}** can be found in Inazuman seawater and are being sold by [**Obata**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/936714993754312724/936749485336453181/Obata.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A plant species that only grows in certain regions and islands of the ocean. Though it looks like a fungus of some sort, it actually comes from a substance secreted by certain soft-bodied organisms.

pages.name: Sango Pearl route
pages.desc:
**Sango Pearls ${Sango Pearl}** can be found in the wilderness of Watatsumi Island and are being sold by [**Yamashiro Kenta**](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/921188291842277476/972158194010968094/Yamashiro_Kenta.png) (up to 5 per 3 days).

> A precious pearl that grows in the coral of Watatsumi. Gives off a cool sheen like that of a moonlight.

pages.name: Amakumo Fruit route
pages.desc:
**Amakumo Fruits ${Amakumo Fruit}** can be found in the wilderness of Seirai Island.

> The fruit of the Amakumo Grass, which grows on Seirai Island. You can hear it crackling with a tiny current if you hold it up to your ear.

pages.name: Fluorescent Fungus route
pages.desc:
**Fluorescent Fungi ${Fluorescent Fungus}** can be found in the wilderness of Tsurumi Island.

> A mushroom that glows like a night-light. Some curious power lies hidden within it.

pages.name: Frog route
pages.desc:
**Frogs** can be found in the wilderness near bodies of fresh water. They are used in crafting.

> Common frog found in moist environments. Full of energy, they secrete a substance that will keep you full of vitality.

pages.name: Loach Pearl route
pages.desc:
**Loach Pearls** can be found in the wilderness near bodies of water.

> A shiny pearl spat out by a loach that has mystical medicinal properties. Minerals and elemental particles ingested by the loach condense into these mildly magical beads. When threatened, the loach spits them out to confuse predators and escape with its life.

pages.name: Unagi Meat route
pages.desc:
**Unagi** can be found on Watatsumi Island.

> The fresh meat of an Unagi. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.

pages.name: Maple Wood route
pages.desc:
**Maple Wood** can be obtained from the Amur Maple and can be used to create furnishings.

> Excellent quality wood with a fine color and texture.

pages.name: Aralia Wood route
pages.desc:
**Aralia Wood** can be obtained from the Inazuman Cedar and can be used to create furnishings.

> It is soft, has straight veins, and gives off a light fragrance.

pages.name: Otogi Wood route
pages.desc:
**Otogi Wood** can be obtained from the Otogi Tree and can be used to create furnishings.

> It has just the right amount of moisture and oil, and as such has a great many uses.

pages.name: Yumemiru Wood route
pages.desc:
**Yumemiru Wood** can be obtained from Sakura Trees and can be used to create furnishings.

> Exquisite in quality and full of moisture, people say that it can lull people into dreams as sweet as the warm spring.

pages.name: Sandbearer Wood route
pages.desc:
**Sandbearer Wood** can be obtained from Sandbearer Trees and can be used to create furnishings.

> Said to be an exceptionally hardy plant resistant to wind and rain with a long lifespan.

pages.name: Whopperflower route (Whopperflower, Shimmering and Energy Nectar): Inazuma
pages.desc:
**Whopperflowers ${Pyro Whopperflower}${Electro Whopperflower}${Cryo Whopperflower}** are Common Enemies found wandering in the wild or disguised as plants such as Mints and Sweet Flowers. They are Mystical Beasts and drop **Whopperflower Nectar ${Whopperflower Nectar}**, **Shimmering Nectar ${Shimmering Nectar}** and **Energy Nectar ${Energy Nectar}**.

This route only contains Whopperflowers in **Inazuma**.

pages.name: Nobushi route (Old, Kageuchi and Famed Handguard)
pages.desc: **Nobushi ${Nobushi: Jintouban}${Nobushi: Hitsukeban}${Nobushi: Kikouban}** are Common Enemies found in Inazuma. They drop **Old Handguard ${Old Handguard}**, **Kageuchi Handguard ${Kageuchi Handguard}** and **Famed Handguard ${Famed Handguard}**.

pages.name: Specter route (Spectral Husk, Heart and Nucleus): Inazuma
pages.desc: **Specters ${Hydro Specter}${Anemo Specter}${Geo Specter}${Electro Specter}${Cryo Specter}** are Common Enemies found in Inazuma. They are Elemental Lifeforms and drop **Spectral Husk ${Spectral Husk}**, **Spectral Heart ${Spectral Heart}** and **Spectral Nucleus ${Spectral Nucleus}**.

pages.name: Specter route (Spectral Husk, Heart and Nucleus): Enkanomiya
pages.desc: **Specters ${Hydro Specter}${Anemo Specter}${Geo Specter}${Electro Specter}${Cryo Specter}** are Common Enemies found in Inazuma. They are Elemental Lifeforms and drop **Spectral Husk ${Spectral Husk}**, **Spectral Heart ${Spectral Heart}** and **Spectral Nucleus ${Spectral Nucleus}**.

pages.name: Floating Fungus route (Fungal Spores, Luminescent Pollen and Crystalline Cyst Dust): Enkanomiya
pages.desc: **Floating Fungi ${Floating Hydro Fungus}** are Common Enemies found in The Chasm. They are Mystical Beasts and drop **Fungal Spores ${Fungal Spores}**, **Luminescent Pollen ${Luminescent Pollen}** and **Crystalline Cyst Dust ${Crystalline Cyst Dust}**.

pages.name: Ruin Guard route (Chaos Device, Circuit and Core)
pages.desc: **Ruin Guards ${Ruin Guard}** are Elite Enemies found across Teyvat. They are Automatons and drop **Chaos Device ${Chaos Device}**, **Chaos Circuit ${Chaos Circuit}** and **Chaos Core ${Chaos Core}**.

pages.name: Ruin Sentinel route (Chaos Gear, Axis and Oculus): Inazuma
pages.desc: **Ruin Sentinels ${Ruin Cruiser}${Ruin Destroyer}${Ruin Defender}${Ruin Scout}** are Elite Enemies found in Inazuma. They are Automatons and drop **Chaos Gear ${Chaos Gear}**, **Chaos Axis ${Chaos Axis}** and **Chaos Oculus ${Chaos Oculus}**.

pages.name: Ruin Sentinel route (Chaos Gear, Axis and Oculus): Enkanomiya
pages.desc: **Ruin Sentinels ${Ruin Cruiser}${Ruin Destroyer}${Ruin Defender}${Ruin Scout}** are Elite Enemies found in Inazuma. They are Automatons and drop **Chaos Gear ${Chaos Gear}**, **Chaos Axis ${Chaos Axis}** and **Chaos Oculus ${Chaos Oculus}**.

pages.name: Fatui Pyro Agent route (Knives and Insignia)
pages.desc: **Fatui Pyro Agents ${Fatui Pyro Agent}** are Elite Enemies found in Liyue and Inazuma. They are members of the Fatui and drop **Hunter's Sacrificial Knife ${Hunter's Sacrificial Knife}**, **Agent's Sacrificial Knife ${Agent's Sacrificial Knife}**, **Inspector's Sacrificial Knife ${Inspector's Sacrificial Knife}**, **Recruit's Insignia ${Recruit's Insignia}**, **Sergeant's Insignia ${Sergeant's Insignia}** and **Lieutenant's Insignia ${Lieutenant's Insignia}**.

pages.name: Fatui Cicin Mages route (Mist Grass and Insignia)
pages.desc: **Fatui Cicin Mages ${Fatui Electro Cicin Mage}${Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage}** are Elite Enemies found wandering by themselves. They are members of the Fatui and drop **Mist Grass Pollen ${Mist Grass Pollen}**, **Mist Grass ${Mist Grass}**, **Mist Grass Wick ${Mist Grass Wick}**, **Recruit's Insignia ${Recruit's Insignia}**, **Sergeant's Insignia ${Sergeant's Insignia}** and **Lieutenant's Insignia ${Lieutenant's Insignia}**.

pages.name: Fatui Mirror Maiden route (Dismal, Crystal and Polarizing Prism)
pages.desc: **Fatui Mirror Maidens ${Mirror Maiden}** are Elite Enemies found in Inazuma. They are members of the Fatui and drop **Dismal Prism ${Dismal Prism}**, **Crystal Prism ${Crystal Prism}** and **Polarizing Prism ${Polarizing Prism}**.

pages.name: Geovishap route (Fragile, Sturdy and Fossilized Bone Shard)
pages.desc: **Geovishaps ${Geovishap}** are Elite Enemies found in Liyue. They belong to the Vishaps and drop **Fragile Bone Shard ${Fragile Bone Shard}**, **Sturdy Bone Shard ${Sturdy Bone Shard}** and **Fossilized Bone Shard ${Fossilized Bone Shard}**.

pages.name: Abyss Mage route (Dead Ley Line Branch, Leaves and Sprout): Mondstadt and Liyue
pages.desc: **Abyss Mages ${Pyro Abyss Mage}${Hydro Abyss Mage}${Cryo Abyss Mage}** are Elite Enemies found around Teyvat. They belong to the Abyss and drop **Dead Ley Line Branch ${Dead Ley Line Branch}**, **Dead Ley Line Leaves ${Dead Ley Line Leaves}** and **Ley Line Sprout ${Ley Line Sprout}**.

pages.name: Abyss Mage route (Dead Ley Line Branch, Leaves and Sprout): Inazuma
pages.desc: **Abyss Mages ${Pyro Abyss Mage}${Hydro Abyss Mage}${Electro Abyss Mage}${Cryo Abyss Mage}** are Elite Enemies found around Teyvat. They belong to the Abyss and drop **Dead Ley Line Branch ${Dead Ley Line Branch}**, **Dead Ley Line Leaves ${Dead Ley Line Leaves}** and **Ley Line Sprout ${Ley Line Sprout}**.

pages.name: Abyss Mage, Herald and Lector route (Dead Ley Line Branch, Leaves and Sprout): Enkanomiya
pages.desc: **Abyss Mages ${Pyro Abyss Mage}${Hydro Abyss Mage}${Electro Abyss Mage}${Cryo Abyss Mage}**, **Abyss Herald ${Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents}** and **Abyss Lector ${Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning}** are Elite Enemies found around Teyvat. They belong to the Abyss and drop **Dead Ley Line Branch ${Dead Ley Line Branch}**, **Dead Ley Line Leaves ${Dead Ley Line Leaves}** and **Ley Line Sprout ${Ley Line Sprout}**.

pages.name: Rifthound route (Concealed Claw, Unguis and Talon)
pages.desc: **Rifthounds ${Rockfond Rifthound Whelp}${Thundercraven Rifthound Whelp}${Rockfond Rifthound}${Thundercraven Rifthound}** are Elite Enemies found on Tsurumi Island. They belong to the Abyss and drop **Concealed Claw ${Concealed Claw}**, **Concealed Unguis ${Concealed Unguis}** and **Concealed Talon ${Concealed Talon}**.

pages.name: Black Serpent Knight route (Gloomy, Dark and Deathly Statuette)
pages.desc: **Black Serpent Knights ${Shadowy Husk: Standard Bearer}${Shadowy Husk: Line Breaker}${Shadowy Husk: Defender}${Black Serpent Knight: Windcutter}** are Elite Enemies found in The Chasm. They belong to the Abyss and drop **Gloomy Statuette ${Gloomy Statuette}**, **Dark Statuette ${Dark Statuette}** and **Deathly Statuette ${Deathly Statuette}**.

pages.name: Radiant Spincrystals
pages.desc: **Radiant Spincrystals** are used to unlock soundtracks in the Serenitea Pot. This guide includes the ones obtained from **Teyvat**, the other ones can be obtained from **Chubby**.

pages.name: Locked Gate with Lumenspar in Underground Mines
pages.desc: Lumenspar behind a locked gate that requires the use of map fragments.

pages.name: Locked Gate near Tiangong Gorge
pages.desc: Unlocked from the bottom of the underground north of the main mining area.

pages.name: "Paleontological Investigation" - Fossil Locations
pages.desc: Fossil locations for Khedive's "Paleontological Investigation" quest. Take pictures at the highlighted locations.

pages.name: "The Millenial Mountains" - Item Locations
pages.desc: Locations of the different items for the "The Millenial Mountains" quest.

pages.name: "The Nine-Word Rumor" - Text Locations
pages.desc: Locations of the secret messages for the "The Nine-Word Rumor" achievement. Unequip your Lumenstone so you can observere them.

pages.name: "If Not Us, Then Who?" - Fatui Action Log Locations
pages.desc: Fatui Action Log locations for the "If Not Us, Then Who?" achievement.

pages.name: "The Chasm Mining Records" - text fragment locations
pages.desc: Locations of the text fragments related to mining for the "The Chasm Mining Records" achievement.

pages.name: Damaged Stone Slate locations
pages.desc: Locations of the 7 Damaged Stone Slates that you need to find. Needed for The Bunkoku Enigma event quest. Solution for the tile puzzle is also available (see next page).

pages.name: The Bunkoku Enigma Tile Puzzle solution
pages.desc: Solution for tile puzzle that is needed for The Bunkoku Enigma event quest. Locations of the 7 Stone Slates that are needed are also available (see previous page).

pages.name: Evernight Temple Electro Monument puzzle
pages.desc: Unlocking the Evernight Temple during the event requires the activation of 4 Electro monuments.

pages.name: South-west Island 3 Seelie locations
pages.desc: Locations of the 3 Seelies needed for a trial during the event.
